div.div:
Green = Components, Resources and traffic of tenant-1
Blue = Components, Resources and traffic of tenant-1
Red = Security configuration using Istio resources
Yellow = Knative Serving namespace/components

switch.text: Green = Components, Resources and traffic of tenant-1...
